gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.montecarlo

Class MultivariateMonteCarloIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cognition.util.AbstractCloneableSerializable
      • gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.montecarlo.MultivariateMonteCarloIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonteCarloIntegrator<Vector>, CloneableSerializable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MultivariateMonteCarloIntegrator
extends AbstractCloneableSerializable
implements MonteCarloIntegrator<Vector>
    A Monte Carlo integrator for multivariate (vector) outputs.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kevin R. Dixon
    See Also:
